Posts.Content: I can't answer those questions. I want to tell you I have said a prayer over you. I know you must be nervous Sherrie Report
Posts.Title: Just had mastectomy, what next?

Posts.Content: If you can tell me how to delete this. I would be very happy Report
Posts.Title: BRCA gene - double mastectomies coming up

Posts.Content: I truly appreciate you moving this to the right place. I'm new to the site and I have a lot of questions. It is very nice to talk with others going through the same issues. Thank you again Sherrie Report

Posts.Content: I'm wanting to find other women that have or are going through this process. Hopefully in doing so we can encourage each other. Knowledge is power 0 likes, 10 replies Report

Posts.Content: sherrie are up you in the correct forum? This is the genitourinary prolapse forum for pelvic floor prolapse. Report

Posts.Content: I'm new to this. I tried to get it started separately but I guess I didn't do it right Report
Posts.Title: BRCA gene - double mastectomies coming up

Posts.Content: Thank you so much!!! I was at a loss on how to proceed. Thank you so much Matron Sherrie Report
Posts.Title: BRCA gene - double mastectomies coming up

Posts.Content: I have a question. Any other daily with cancer? Report The only dealing I've ever had is my mother. She was diagnosed at 50 and died at 52. This is why I am worried. Report Your story is my story. I have had many scares. My advice is to do your best to stay as calm as you can. Try not to worry till you have something to worry about. Friday can't come soon enough. Please let me know what you find out. It is easy to feel out of control on this Report Yes ma'am it is! It is so scary and nobody understands how hard it is to stay positive. Thank you for understanding and I will let you know asap Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: Your story is my story. I have had many scares. My advice is to do your best to stay as calm as you can. Try not to worry till you have something to worry about. Friday can't come soon enough. Please let me know what you find out. It is easy to feel out of control on this Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: Could you tell me a bit more history? What Did she have done as far as surgeries Report
Posts.Title: My mum has breast cancer and intense tightness in her breast

Posts.Content: That sounds like great news!!! Please let me know if you need to talk about any of this. This news made my day. You are blessed Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: What stage was she How extensive was treatments - any chemo? Did she have reconstructive? Implants? How long ago? Report
